__e: You could sit right by me and Grandpa.
You know, I don't think I've ever hung out with you and Grandpa at the same time.
Grandpa Aang and his friends were around our age when they traveled the world.
Alex called this morning. Grandpa Clark told him I couldn't come to the phone...
Do you know what your grandfather did to that dog?
Grandpa left his coffee maker on the ship, you know, the French press thing...
